A good game for when you're bored and don't feel like playing CS:GO. Gamemodes such as gungame, surf, Bhop, and just good old Counter Strike T v CT. Now I haven't been EVERYWHERE on the servers but I can semi guarentee there are competetive-like servers.

i got this game because of gmod

just like the other ones, CS: Source is CS 1.6 But redone in the source engine, unlike 1.6 (And CZ, NZ) You can mod it with gun camos for, aks, snipers, pistols and plenty of other shit all for free (not the game but the mods) 

i will gladly say you should get this over 1.6 and condition zero, nexon zombies has zombies so it can have a pass but you should get this now if you've not!

Modding Site (With CSS Page to find mods) - http://www.gamemodding.net/en/counter-strike-source/

(Installing them - just go to the main game directory and put your mod there, or in a folder you made and place it there, from here click the mod and accept the thing it asks you and install your mod, its automatic so its pish easy to install them, enjoy)

10/10 - can get skins without paying :D

Понравилось

While it isn't the newest and most populated Counter Strike Game, it is well worth it. Not only does it have spot on multiplayer and balancing, but it's great mods & pretty decent singleplayer. CSS can run on almost any computer that meets modern laptop standards at 60 fps, and can be on Windows, Mac, and Linux/SteamOS. This Makes this game good for any steam machine or custom console living room setup(as long as you can set a controller up). Well let's stop talking about specs and get to gameplay/features. I made a list of features below:

Features:
- Singleplayer & Multiplayer
- Moddable
- Hostage Rescue & Bomb Defuse gamemodes
- Pretty good bots
- Realistic Weapons and Equipment
- Lots of maps
- Steam Achievements & Stats

Overall you really didn't need to read the whole review, if you were smart enough you already bought the game.

Things good with CSS:
✔ No russians
✔ No skins
✔ Generally a pretty fun game to play with friends

this game sucks

As others have said, a lot of people buy Counter Strike: Source to get Garry's Mod working. That goes for me. I had the game in my library then one day decided to play it. It's tons of fun and easy to get into. While it doesn't have a lot of players like CSGO has, Counter Strike Source is still fun. There's still Surf, Gun Game, and more. There aren't any skins or knifes, it's just simple CT Vs T. Yes, it is more expensive than CSGO, but if you have a low-end computer and you can't run CSGO, then Counter Strike: Source is for you.

-Quick Review-
Good game to play if you love being yelled at by angry German and Russian kids. All jokes aside it is a great game to be played with focus and then alot of regret.


-Detailed breakdown review-
Story: You are a man and shoot at the people thingies with your boom boom gun.

Gameplay: Well, as I said.

Achievements: Feels good to get an acheivement, don't come too often but they keep a consistent flow once you get on a roll.

Price: Very good for the thriving community and polite, well mannered players.

Conclusion: BANG
